channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voici les 10 séries les plus piratées en 2025
item.description: Le top 10 des séries les plus téléchargées illégalement vient de sortir. Cette année, plusieurs séries Netflix s'offrent la tête du classement, à commencer par une série qui vient de faire son (dernier) retour sur le devant de la scène.

item.title: Argos Boxing Day sale includes up to 50% off TVs, appliances, toys, and more tech — here are the 13 best deals I'd buy
item.description: These are the best deals from the Argos Boxing Day sale, including savings of up to 50% on TVs, appliances, furniture, toys, games consoles, and more top-rated tech.

item.title: On a testé la BYD Atto 2 DM-i hybride avec 1 000 km d’autonomie : une bonne affaire face à la version électrique ? Voici notre avis
item.description: BYD a lancé l'Atto 2 DM-i "Super Hybrid", le SUV hybride rechargeable le plus petit et le moins cher du marché. Comment atteint-il une autonomie électrique de 90 km ? À quoi ça sert ? On vous explique !

item.title: The Astro A20 X doesn't get any points for originality, but it's still a great gaming headset
item.description: The Astro A20 X is just a Logitech G522 Lightspeed with a new platform switching feature, but that still means it offers great sound.

item.title: Watch Christmas films from anywhere with a VPN
item.description: Don't let geo-restrictions get in the way of your movie marathons

item.title: These are the 5 best TVs I tested in 2025, from flagship OLEDs to affordable mini-LEDs
item.description: I tested a lot of TVs in 2025, and these were the very best of the bunch.

item.title: The iPhone 17 was a win, but Apple needs to keep buffing up the base model in 2026
item.description: If Apple wants to keep up with Samsung and Google in terms of mobile hardware, it needs to keep boosting the base model iPhone in 2026.

item.title: Grab Game Pass and store credit for your new Xbox here
item.description: Power up your new Xbox with these gift cards or a Game Pass subscription.

item.title: Noise Luna Ring (Gen 2) review: a subscription-free Oura rival that’s solid but not standout
item.description: An updated version of the Luna Ring with a slimmer design, better battery and useful tools – but nothing game-changing in a crowded smart ring market.

item.title: 22 best deals from the Currys Boxing Day sale — save up to 40% on TVs, laptops, appliances, and more tech
item.description: Currys has launched another round of Epic Deals as part of its Boxing Day sale, so I've searched through and picked out the 22 best tech offers.

item.title: Fin et avec un écran lumineux, le Realme 14T est un smartphone encore plus accessible à moitié prix
item.description: Le Realme 14T s'accompagne d'un écran Amoled et de l'intelligence artificielle pour magnifier vos photos. Chez AliExpress, il passe de 299 euros à 136 euros.

item.title: The John Lewis Boxing Day sale is live: see 19 expert-picked deals on TVs, laptops, headphones, and more
item.description: The John Lewis Boxing Day sale is live and features excellent record-low prices on appliances, TVs, laptops, and other categories today.

item.title: Près d’un million de cadeaux de Noël en vente : les Français battent de nouveaux records
item.description: Les Français ne veulent plus conserver les cadeaux de Noël qui ne leur plaisent pas. Dès le 25 décembre au matin, des centaines de milliers de présents ont été mis en vente sur les plateformes d’occasion, comme eBay et Rakuten. La revente fait désormais partie des traditions, et les Français ne s'en cachent plus.

item.title: 10 great books that Fast Company staff want you to read this year
item.description: In the spirit of fighting back against AI slop and salvaging what’s left of our attention spans, we curated a list of must-reads to start your 2026 off right. It’s time to reckon with the reality that nonstop doomscrolling has delivered us: a hard-to-ignore erosion of our cognitive skills. We’ve lost the ability to focus on words for long stretches of time . . . er, read books. ...

item.title: Ricoh GR IV Review: Everyone's Favorite Pocket Camera Gets Better
item.description: Ricoh’s cult-inspiring pocketable camera gets a small update, with important improvements in autofocus and image quality.

item.title: Could You Use a Rowboat to Walk on the Seafloor Like Jack Sparrow?
item.description: In Pirates of the Caribbean, Jack and Will use an overturned dinghy to hold air underwater. Madness or brilliance?

item.title: This year I'm buying Blu-rays again like it's 2016 – here's why you should too
item.description: I'll be spending less on streaming in 2026 and buying Blu-ray instead. It isn't just about nostalgia either –here's why it makes sense.

item.title: Microsoft, drop your AI obsession and give us what we really want: a lightweight Windows 11 that nails the basics
item.description: Windows 11 needs some serious work - but there’s a fantastic alternative I bet Microsoft won’t even consider.

item.title: How to find lost AirPods
item.description: Losing AirPods happens to the best of us. They’re small, they slide into couch cushions and they love disappearing into bags or pockets when you least expect it. Luckily, Apple’s Find My system makes it easy to track down misplaced AirPods, whether you dropped the case somewhere or can’t find one of the individual earbuds. With the right settings enabled, your iPhone can show the last place they were connected, play a sound to help you hunt them down or even guide you with on-screen directions. Here’s how to use Find My to locate lost AirPods and how to track down the left or right earbud if o...
